A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best movie of the trilogy. Ryan Johnson showed us Kylo crumbling soul\, Ray's devotion\, beautiful Carrie Fisher. The relationship between Rey and Kylo becomes deeper\, more complex\, more attractive. He showed us Raylo\, and the chance that Ray could save Kylo's soul would bring him back to the light. 9th KILLED ALL.
